s.text: Aziz said: "The continuous falsehoods spread by Kuwait's rulers are aimed at manufacturing an artificial crisis to give the Americans and British a pretext to continue their attacks on Iraq and keep the sanctions against its people in place."

Iraq Lodges Protest with United Nations Concerning British and American Raids Baghdad 8-15 (AFP) - Iraq protested strongly to the United Nations against American and British air raids which targeted civilian installations in southern Iraq, killing two people and injuring 23 others according to a report by the official Iraqi news agency today, Tuesday.

Al-Sahaf added: "These two regimes are directly involved in the attack against Iraq through their support of air raids by American and British planes and by allowing these planes to fly from air bases in Saudi Arabia and Kuwait."
